body: Hello Forum, Instead of a large range I would like to select specific hours of specific days of the year to display the sun for.  The component allows for multiple lists but loses the comparison across the resulting hours. Any advice...? Thanks[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/uTDt6F4umkIg9JZAgzkjB1BCRZv2xfPygqy8FolPUStqKqZi65EGhPYsPGd9WOHH0diStF4KfPIOTO*sMtUdNzx1HZwaIr9u/Ladybugforumquestion.JPG)

replies.body: Connect the list of months, hours and days to the separate day, hour, month input instead of using analysis period.
